translations: n.小翅脉；[解剖] 小静脉

phrs.translation: 微静脉, 小静脉, 细静脉, 小静脉英语
毛细血管后微静脉, 毛细血锟杰猴拷微锟斤拷锟斤拷
静脉, 高内皮细胞小静脉, 小静脉
黄斑下小静脉, 下黄斑静脉
黄斑上小静脉, 上黄斑静脉

sentences.sentence: Objective To reveal the morphology feature of postcapillary venule.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨人皮肤癌毛细血管后微静脉的形态特征。

sentences.sentence: The round depressions occurred on the surface of the venule in the lung parenchyma.
sentences.translation: 在肺实质内微静脉的表面也可以见到许多呈圆形的凹陷。

sentences.sentence: And the capillaries were also directly drained into the collecting venule or the venule.
sentences.translation: 毛细血管也可以直接汇入集合微静脉或微静脉。
